author: Toni Shope
text:
Does anyone have a written communication plan that address such issues as staff responsibilities, media use, procedures and content to inform citizens of activities and accomplishments to enhance your public image? 
Of particular interest would be a communications plan for your law enforcement agency, however, input from any area of local government that could be used as a model would be appreciated. 
Thank you,
title: Communications Plan
